VIRec is developed by A3DV team for efficiently recording synced dual camera, IMU and GPS data on a mobile device.

All data sessions are saved in '/Android/data/io.a3dv.VIRec/files/data/' on the SD card. Each data session in a folder named after the local time at the start of recording has nine files:

 1. movie.mp4: Main camera frames.
 2. movie2.mp4: Secondary camera frames.
 3. frame_timestamps.txt: timestamp for each frame of main camera.
 4. frame_timestamps2.txt: timestamp for each frame of secondary camera.
 5. movie_metadata.csv: Main camera metadata including focal distance, focal length in pixels, etc.
 6. movie_metadata2.csv: Secondary camera metadata including focal distance, focal length in pixels, etc.
 7. edge_epochs.txt: timestamps at the start and end of recording.
 8. gyro_accel.csv: IMU data.
 9. location.csv: GPS data.
